name: Antrag prüfen
author: 67261fc6-3ce1-4000-a782-b97e88b37698
definition: des Antragstellers","placeholder":"Max","input":true,"disabled":true,"tableView":true,"validate":{"required":true}}]},{"width":6,"components":[{"type":"textfield","key":"antragstellerNachname","label":"Nachname des Antragstellers","placeholder":"Mustermann","input":true,"disabled":true,"tableView":true,"validate":{"required":true}}]}]},{"type":"columns","key":"columnsAntragDetails","input":false,"columns":[{"width":6,"components":[{"type":"textfield","key":"personalnummer","label":"Personalnummer","placeholder":"12345","input":true,"disabled":true,"tableView":true,"validate":{"required":true}}]},{"width":6,"components":[{"type":"datetime","key":"antragsdatum","label":"Antragsdatum","format":"dd.MM.yyyy","enableTime":false,"input":true,"disabled":true,"tableView":true,"validate":{"required":true}}]}]},{"type":"select","key":"aenderungsart","label":"Art der Änderung","placeholder":"Bitte wählen","data":{"values":[{"label":"Adressänderung","value":"adresse"},{"label":"Bankverbindung","value":"bank"},{"label":"Kontaktdaten","value":"kontakt"},{"label":"Familienstand","value":"familienstand"},{"label":"Steuerklasse","value":"steuer"},{"label":"Sonstige","value":"sonstige"}]},"dataSrc":"values","template":"{{ item.label }}","input":true,"disabled":true,"tableView":true,"validate":{"required":true}}]},{"type":"panel","key":"panelStammdaten","title":"Zu ändernde Stammdaten","label":"Zu ändernde Stammdaten","collapsible":true,"collapsed":false,"input":false,"tableView":false,"components":[{"type":"textarea","key":"aktuellerWert","label":"Aktueller Wert","placeholder":"Bisheriger Eintrag in den Stammdaten","rows":3,"input":true,"disabled":true,"tableView":true,"validate":{"required":false}},{"type":"textarea","key":"neuerWert","label":"Neuer Wert","placeholder":"Gewünschter neuer Eintrag","rows":3,"input":true,"disabled":true,"tableView":true,"validate":{"required":true}},{"type":"textarea","key":"aenderungsgrund","label":"Begründung der Änderung","placeholder":"Grund für die beantragte Änderung","rows":4,"input":true,"disabled":true,"tableView":true,"validate":{"required":true}}]},{"type":"panel","key":"panelPruefung","title":"Prüfungsergebnis","label":"Prüfungsergebnis","collapsible":false,"input":false,"tableView":false,"components":[{"type":"select","key":"pruefungsentscheidung","label":"Entscheidung","placeholder":"Bitte wählen Sie eine Entscheidung","data":{"values":[{"label":"Genehmigt - Weiter zur Identitätsprüfung","value":"genehmigt"},{"label":"Abgelehnt - Antrag zurückweisen","value":"abgelehnt"},{"label":"Rückfrage erforderlich","value":"rueckfrage"}]},"dataSrc":"values","template":"{{ item.label }}","input":true,"tableView":true,"validate":{"required":true,"customMessage":"Bitte treffen Sie eine Entscheidung über den Antrag."}},{"type":"textarea","key":"pruefungsanmerkungen","label":"Anmerkungen zur Prüfung","placeholder":"Tragen Sie hier ggf. Anmerkungen, Hinweise oder Rückfragen ein","rows":5,"input":true,"tableView":true,"validate":{"required":false,"maxLength":1000}},{"type":"textarea","key":"ablehnungsgrund","label":"Ablehnungsgrund","placeholder":"Falls abgelehnt: Bitte begründen Sie die Ablehnung","rows":4,"input":true,"tableView":true,"conditional":{"show":true,"when":"pruefungsentscheidung","eq":"abgelehnt"},"validate":{"required":true,"customMessage":"Bei Ablehnung muss ein Grund angegeben werden."}}]},{"type":"button","label":"Prüfung abschließen","key":"submit","size":"md","block":false,"action":"submit","disableOnInvalid":true,"theme":"primary","input":true,"tableView":false}]},"customCss":"","dvfDefVersion":"1.0"}
